name: Under Pressure (itch) (Fluffy_Kaeloky, Pierre Juzdzewski, Drafy, Douxie_Joke, Kyntoue)
name_original: Under Pressure (itch) (Fluffy_Kaeloky, Pierre Juzdzewski, Drafy, Douxie_Joke, Kyntoue)
description:
Play UnderPressure as a fox trying to rescue his girlfriend who has been captured ! 

You will encounter many guards and surveillance cameras . Avoid them to get your girlfriend back.

Oh ! And maybe you should not have quenched your thirst before going on your quest !
